commit.message:
Auto merge of #70149 - Xanewok:update-rls, r=Xanewok

submodules: Update RLS and Rustfmt

Fixes #70129.
Fixes #70280.

Regression fixed specifically with https://github.com/rust-lang/rls/commit/4a587b5fda6c2c9302562ece8c2795cd9848c553.

r? @ghost
